title.narrative: Get Up Speak Out: For Youth Rights (GUSO)

description.narrative: IPPF is one of the members of the SRHR consortium, Rutgers is the Lead Party. Ultimate donor is the Netherlands' Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Grant reference MINBUZA-2016.56672. Activity number 28432.
